original_text: His power shall be great—but not by his own power; and he shall cause fearful destruction and shall succeed in what he does, and destroy mighty men and the people who are the saints.
korean_text: 그 권세가 강할 것이나 자기의 힘으로 말미암은 것이 아니며 그가 장차 놀랍게 파괴 행위를 하고 자의로 행하여 형통하며 강한 자들과 거룩한 백성을 멸하리라

sentences.original_text: but not by his own power
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 자신의 권능으로 말미암지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: and he shall cause fearful destruction
and shall succeed in what he does
and destroy mighty men and the people
